summary: Frontend testing completed for DataViz Studio improvements. All 8 features verified and working correctly: dropdown text visibility fixed, 14 chart types with SVG previews available, new chart types (Treemap, Waterfall, Box Plot, Sankey, Candlestick) render correctly, Report Builder has modern gradient design, Export PDF button is visible.

frontend: Dropdown text visibility in Add Widget panel (Data Source, Field, Aggregation) - all text visible with proper contrast
Selected values visible in dropdown triggers (e.g., 'Sales Data 2026 (10 rows)')
Chart type selector shows 14 chart types with mini SVG previews
All 14 chart types available: Bar, Line, Pie, Area, Scatter, Radar, Funnel, Gauge, Heatmap, Treemap, Waterfall, Box Plot, Sankey, Candlestick
Treemap chart type renders correctly in Live Preview
Candlestick chart type renders correctly in Live Preview
Report Builder has modern gradient header design (linear-gradient from blue to coral)
Report Builder stat cards have gradient backgrounds with patterns
Export PDF button is visible with white text on blue gradient background
DataViz Studio branding present in Report Builder footer

context_for_next_testing_agent: All DataViz Studio UI improvements verified: 1) SelectTrigger uses text-foreground for visible text, 2) ChartTypePreview.jsx provides SVG mini previews for all 14 chart types, 3) CHART_TYPES array extended with 5 new types (treemap, waterfall, boxplot, sankey, candlestick), 4) Report Builder header/footer have gradient backgrounds, 5) StatCard.jsx uses gradient backgrounds with patterns

details.data_source_dropdown: Text visible ('Sales Data 2026 (10 rows)') with color rgb(15, 23, 41)
details.field_dropdown: Text visible with options (Region, Sales, Quarter)

details.treemap: Renders correctly with colored rectangles showing data distribution
details.candlestick: Renders correctly with OHLC bars in green color

details.stat_card_gradients: 4 stat cards with varied gradient backgrounds
details.footer_branding: DataViz Studio logo and branding present
